protein_coding.label: Protein coding
protein_coding.definition: Transcipt that contains an open reading frame (ORF).

retained_intron.label: Retained intron
retained_intron.definition: An alternatively spliced transcript believed to contain intronic sequence relative to other, coding, transcripts of the same gene.

processed_transcript.label: Processed transcript
processed_transcript.definition: Gene/transcript that doesn't contain an open reading frame (ORF).

nonsense_mediated_decay.label: Nonsense Mediated Decay
nonsense_mediated_decay.definition: A transcript with a premature stop codon considered likely to be subjected to targeted degradation.

processed_pseudogene.label: Processed pseudogene
processed_pseudogene.definition: Pseudogene that lack introns and is thought to arise from reverse transcription of mRNA followed by reinsertion of DNA into the genome.

unprocessed_pseudogene.label: Unprocessed pseudogene
unprocessed_pseudogene.definition: Pseudogene that can contain introns since produced by gene duplication

misc_RNA.label: miscRNA
misc_RNA.definition: Miscellaneous RNA. A non-coding RNA that cannot be classified.

snRNA.label: snRNA
snRNA.definition: Small RNA molecules that are found in the cell nucleus and are involved in the processing of pre messenger RNAs

miRNA.label: miRNA
miRNA.definition: A small RNA (~22bp) that silences the expression of target mRNA

TEC.label: TEC (To be Experimentally Confirmed)
TEC.definition: Regions with EST clusters that have polyA features that could indicate the presence of protein coding genes.

snoRNA.label: snoRNA
snoRNA.definition: Small RNA molecules that are found in the cell nucleolus and are involved in the post-transcriptional modification of other RNAs.

IG_V_gene.label: IG V gene
IG_V_gene.definition: Variable chain immunoglobulin gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

polymorphic_pseudogene.label: Polymorphic pseudogene
polymorphic_pseudogene.definition: Pseudogene owing to a SNP/indel but in other individuals/haplotypes/strains the gene is translated.

unitary_pseudogene.label: Unitary pseudogene
unitary_pseudogene.definition: A species specific unprocessed pseudogene without a parent gene, as it has an active orthologue in another species.

IG_D_gene.label: IG D gene
IG_D_gene.definition: Diversity chain immunoglobulin gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

IG_C_gene.label: IG C gene
IG_C_gene.definition: Constant chain immunoglobulin gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

IG_J_gene.label: IG J gene
IG_J_gene.definition: Joining chain immunoglobulin gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

Mt_tRNA.label: Mt-tRNA
Mt_tRNA.definition: A transfer RNA located in the mitochondrial genome

IG_C_pseudogene.label: IG C gene
IG_C_pseudogene.definition: Constant chain immunoglobulin gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

TR_C_gene.label: TR C gene
TR_C_gene.definition: Constant chain T cell receptor gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

IG_J_pseudogene.label: IG J gene
IG_J_pseudogene.definition: Joining chain immunoglobulin gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

TR_D_gene.label: TR D gene
TR_D_gene.definition: Diversity chain T cell receptor gene that undergoes somatic recombination before transcription

translated_processed_pseudogene.label: Translated Processed pseudogene
translated_processed_pseudogene.definition: Pseudogenes that have mass spec data suggesting that they are also translated

translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.label: Translated Unprocessed  pseudogene
translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.definition: Pseudogenes that have mass spec data suggesting that they are also translated

vault_RNA.label: vaultRNA
vault_RNA.definition: Short non coding RNA genes that form part of the vault ribonucleoprotein complex.
